title: NYC Rental Market Reaching a Breaking Point
itunes:title: NYC Rental Market Reaching a Breaking Point
description:
Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News U.S. Real Estate Reporter Prashant Gopal discuss the New York City rental market being pushed to a breaking point by tenant debts. We get Businessweek Economics with Bloomberg News Executive Editor for International Government Rosalind Mathieson. She discusses a new world order emerging. Penny Wheeler, CEO at Allina Health, provides an update on the coronavirus in the Midwest. And we Drive to the Close with Dan Pipitone, Co-Founder of TradeZero America.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
